file_content.text: Damn you, pretender.
So. You're the one who killed my men--the pretender who wants to be the Blade.
Who are you? What men?
What?
I sent some thugs to raid your room. Since I never heard back, I assume you dealt with them. They wouldn't have the stomach to betray me.
I'm no pretender. I earned my name.
I am the Blade.
You think this is a joke?
You must be the pirate who's too scared to use his name.
At last, the mysterious fool.
I'm the Red Blade, you worm--the real Red Blade. And you've got one chance to explain yourself before I burn a hole through your head.
Listen to me, Blade. There's been a misunderstanding.
This is all a mistake.
Oh? I'd love to hear this.
Come on. What's your story?
I was being blackmailed. They threatened my family, my friends... they said if I didn't pretend to be the Blade, everyone I cared about was dead.
I was forced into it.
I heard that the Red Blade was dead. I wanted to carry on your legacy.
It was in your honor.
Are you joking?
It's the truth. I never intended to cause you trouble.
This is real.
You know, I can actually believe that. I'll tell you what, kid:
Take my weapon. It's yours. I still have to kill you--but at least you'll die one of the Blades.
I appreciate your generosity--but I'm not planning to die.
Well, thanks.
Too bad. I'll try to make this painless--but no promises.
What do you mean, "one of the Blades"?
Blades?
You heard me. But that's all you're going to get before you die.
You rotten piece of filth. You know I'm innocent!
Scum.
Yeah. I tried to be nice. Guess we're through with that.
Are you amused?
It depends.
Not really.
Ah, I didn't expect you to go for that story anyway.
Forget it.
This isn't going to work, is it?
Nevermind.
Cute. But no, it isn't.
You're dead, pretender.
Prove that you're the real Blade. Then we'll talk.
You could be pretending, too.
Ha! You've got guts, kid. It's almost too bad that I have to kill you.
Hard to explain myself to a dead man.
I don't need to. [Attack]
You're a piece of work, but you're not leaving here alive.
Don't bother me, kid.
